name: Gas City "Alpha" Demo - SP (Single Player Demo)
name_original: Gas City "Alpha" Demo - SP (Single Player Demo)
description:
Gas City is a virtual reality megacity in development by Gasflip Inc. that serves as the foundation of our Metaverse. This version of the software is a prototype demo of our current working version of Gas City as a single player environment.  As a prototype it is a single player demo and has limited features compared to our upcoming Gas City Metaverse. 

-Run around the City and see how it looks (the Walkabout method)

-Break some barrels in the park 

-Kick Cars and Busses 

-Look at cool things in development. 

This is an alpha demo so it will have a glitch here and there. This is common in all software releases of alpha and beta demos. The demo is to let you play our single-person prototype and see certain  proof of concept features.. Updates will be made for this single player demo over time as we add new features or want to show you in-development game mechanics.  This isn't a full game nor full project, but ONLY a demo.  Enjoy!
